about_the_game:
The Unlikely Duo: Bepp and Gola – Leave the City's Troubles to Them!

The city is under siege by pollution-spreading monsters, and broken power lines have plunged it into darkness.

Amid the constant chaos, Bepp the street cleaner and Gola the electrician join forces to bring the city back to life.

Together, this professional duo sweeps away the grime and restores the light of hope, paving the way for the city's brighter future.

Meet the Two Heroes

Bepp the Street Cleaner
Armed with his trusty cleaning tools, Bepp takes on the pollution monsters with the precision of a pro.
Keeping the city clean is his mission – when it comes to cleaning, you can count on Bepp!

Gola the Electrician
A specialist in fixing broken power lines and bringing light back to the city.
Though she can't directly fight the monsters, her work shines a light against the darkness and guides the city toward a brighter tomorrow.

Plan the duo's movements and control time!

The game features a unique system where players place actions on a timeline and control characters as if programming them.

By moving both characters simultaneously and utilizing their distinct roles, players can solve the puzzles embedded within each stage.

Additionally, the ability to freely fast-forward and rewind time allows for trial and error, making it enjoyable to discover the optimal solution.
